title: Geometric deep learning approach to knot theory. (arXiv:2305.16808v1 [math.GT])
abstract: In this paper, we introduce a novel way to use geometric deep learning for knot data by constructing a functor that takes knots to graphs and using graph neural networks. We will attempt to predict several knot invariants with this approach. This approach demonstrates high generalization capabilities.
context:
Title: Geometric deep learning approach to knot theory. (arXiv:2305.16808v1 [math.GT])
Abstract: In this paper, we introduce a novel way to use geometric deep learning for knot data by constructing a functor that takes knots to graphs and using graph neural networks. We will attempt to predict several knot invariants with this approach. This approach demonstrates high generalization capabilities.
translated_title: 基于几何深度学习的结论理论方法
translated_abstract: 本文提出了一种新的方法，通过构建一个函子将结构转化为图形，使用图神经网络来处理结论数据。我们将尝试使用这种方法预测几种结论不变量。这种方法具有较高的泛化能力。
tldr: 本文利用几何深度学习构建了一个函子将结论转化为图形，并使用图神经网络预测结论不变量，具有高泛化能力。
en_tdlr: This paper proposes a new approach using geometric deep learning to convert knots to graphs and use graph neural networks to predict knot invariants, demonstrating high generalization capabilities.
